I don't like NTR (at all), but this is good. And I agree it's not really NTR anyway. 

I mean, NTR = cuckold fetish story in which a male MC's wife/GF gets fucked by someone else. His shame & humiliation are the point, and they're supposed to be erotic (in some fucked-up sense).

Here, Sokabe's BF, Kenta, isn't the MC. He's just some random shithead along the way, a jerk who treats her badly and gets what he deserves. The MC is either Sokabe or Taneichi, depending on the reader's taste, and the hook is more vanilla than fetish.
